Y(12540) = intersection, other than A, B, C, of circumconics {{A, B, C, X(3839), X(46168)}}

Y(12540) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {11539, 15707}, {15699, 15705}, {549, 15709}

Y(12540) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {12100, 15707}, {15705, 3530}, {15709, 14890}

Y(12540) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {2, 15695, 6944}, {30, 14890, 15709}, {30, 15707, 12100}, {30, 3530, 15705}, {140, 15690, 10124}, {140, 549, 5066}, {547, 12100, 550}, {547, 15713, 140}, {549, 10303, 11540}, {549, 11539, 10304}, {549, 15713, 3526}, {549, 3526, 15759}, {549, 3534, 3530}, {549, 5054, 14890}, {550, 631, 12108}, {631, 5054, 11539}, {3524, 14093, 17504}, {3524, 5054, 15713}, {3525, 3529, 16456}, {3628, 3856, 5056}, {5054, 5055, 10303}, {6923, 15702, 3845}, {10124, 14093, 547}, {10124, 17504, 14892}, {10304, 11539, 3628}, {11539, 15707, 30}, {11539, 15714, 15699}, {12108, 15759, 549}, {14869, 15721, 11812}, {14892, 17504, 15690}, {15683, 15759, 548}, {15693, 16239, 15691}, {15708, 15709, 15706}
